name: Mr. Jump Wakes up in a Field and is Late for an Art Class
name_original: Mr. Jump Wakes up in a Field and is Late for an Art Class
description:
Mr. Jump woke up one morning and found himself in a field. He can't remember a thing from the night before. When he checks his watch, he sees that he is running late for an art class that he happens to be failing. He made a promise to he dead cat, Orange, that he would not fail this art class. So he decides to start running the the near by temple of time. Along the way, he see what he believes to be clones of his dead cat. He believes that they are there to punish him for being late. Can Mr. Jump time travel back to art class.

P.S. please don't take this game to seriously, this is meant to be a joke game that I made to learn Unreal Engine, have fun -The Dev
